verses.verse: To every thing there is a season <S%H2165><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to every purpose <S%H2656><s%> under the heaven <S%H8064><s%>:

A time <S%H6256><s%> to be born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to die <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to plant <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to pluck up <S%H6131><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that which is planted <S%H5193><s%> <S%H8803><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to heal <S%H7495><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to break down <S%H6555><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to build up <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8800><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to weep <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to laugh <S%H7832><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to mourn <S%H5594><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to dance <S%H7540><s%> <S%H8800><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to cast away <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8687><s%> stones <S%H68><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to gather <S%H3664><s%> stones <S%H68><s%> together <S%H3664><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to embrace <S%H2263><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to refrain <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from embracing <S%H2263><s%> <S%H8763><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to get <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8763><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to lose <S%H6><s%> <S%H8763><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to cast away <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8687><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to rend <S%H7167><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to sew <S%H8609><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> to keep silence <S%H2814><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%>;

A time <S%H6256><s%> to love <S%H157><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> to hate <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8800><s%>; a time <S%H6256><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%>, and a time <S%H6256><s%> of peace <S%H7965><s%>.
What profit <S%H3504><s%> hath he that worketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in that wherein <S%H834><s%> he laboureth <S%H6001><s%> ?

I have seen <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the travail <S%H6045><s%>, which 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> to be exercised <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in it.

He hath made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> every thing beautiful <S%H3303><s%> in his time <S%H6256><s%>: also he hath set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the world <S%H5769><s%> in their heart <S%H3820><s%>, so that <S%H1097><s%> no man <S%H120><s%> can find out <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the work <S%H4639><s%> that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> maketh <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> from the beginning <S%H7218><s%> to the end <S%H5490><s%>.

I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that there is no good <S%H2896><s%> in them, but for a man to rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, and to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> good <S%H2896><s%> in his life <S%H2416><s%>.

And also that every man <S%H120><s%> should eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and drink <S%H8354><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and enjoy <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%> of all his labour <S%H5999><s%>, it is the gift <S%H4991><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.

I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that, whatsoever 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, it shall be for ever <S%H5769><s%>: nothing <S%H369><s%> can be put <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to it, nor any thing taken <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8800><s%> from it: and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> doeth <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> it, that men should fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> him.

That which hath been is now <S%H3528><s%>; and that which is to be hath already <S%H3528><s%> been; and 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> requireth <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> that which is past <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

And moreover I saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> under the sun <S%H8121><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of judgment <S%H4941><s%>, that wickedness <S%H7562><s%> was there; and the place <S%H4725><s%> of righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, that iniquity <S%H7562><s%> was there.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine heart <S%H3820><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> shall judge <S%H8199><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> and the wicked <S%H7563><s%>: for there is a time <S%H6256><s%> there for every purpose <S%H2656><s%> and for every work <S%H4639><s%>.

I said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in mine heart <S%H3820><s%> concerning the estate <S%H1700><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, that 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> might manifest <S%H1305><s%> <S%H8800><s%> them, and that they might see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> that they <S%H1992><s%> themselves are beasts <S%H929><s%>.

For that which befalleth <S%H4745><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> befalleth <S%H4745><s%> beasts <S%H929><s%>; even one thing <S%H259><s%> befalleth <S%H4745><s%> them: as the one dieth <S%H4194><s%>, so dieth <S%H4194><s%> the other <S%H2088><s%>; yea, they have all one <S%H259><s%> breath <S%H7307><s%>; so that a man <S%H120><s%> hath no preeminence <S%H4195><s%> above a beast <S%H929><s%>: for all is vanity <S%H1892><s%>.
All go <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto one <S%H259><s%> place <S%H4725><s%>; all are of the dust <S%H6083><s%>, and all turn <S%H7725><s%> to dust <S%H6083><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Who knoweth <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> that goeth <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8802><s%> upward <S%H4605><s%>, and the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the beast <S%H929><s%> that goeth <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8802><s%> downward <S%H4295><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%> ?

Wherefore I perceive <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> that there is nothing better <S%H2896><s%>, than that a man <S%H120><s%> should rejoice <S%H8055><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in his own works <S%H4639><s%>; for that is his portion <S%H2506><s%>: for who shall bring <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him to see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8800><s%> what shall be after <S%H310><s%> him?
